title: Instructional Design and Technical Education Using 3D Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental instructional design theories and educational technology tools
context.additional_context: Practicing interaction-centered instructional design in a 3D virtual learning environment based on Mozilla Hubs, emphasizing collaboration among learners and technology integration skills.

learning_goals: Learners can create exhibits applying instructional design principles in 3D virtual environments
Learners can propose design improvements incorporating peer feedback using VR-based collaboration tools
Learners can integrate core elements of technology education (learner autonomy, staged task design) into 3D simulations

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Support Guide Document

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
